subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Sept. 1 (AP) — Matt Ryan threw for five touchdowns — the second most at Boston College to Doug Flutie — and DeJuan Tribble intercepted three passes Saturday to help the Eagles defeat Wake Forest, 38-28, and give Jeff Jagodzinski a victory in his head-coaching debut.
